${ModID}:Duelity.NAME: Duelity
${ModID}:Duelity.FLAVOR: Apparently Gremlin Nobs are bad at spelling.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Skill, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:GremlinClaw.NAME: Gremlin Claw
${ModID}:GremlinClaw.FLAVOR: Gremlins can be very dangerous even without a weapon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, heal #b1 HP.

${ModID}:GremlinHood.NAME: Gremlin Hood
${ModID}:GremlinHood.FLAVOR: The orange mask bandits never really caught on.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose #b1 of #b3 random #yGremlin cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

${ModID}:NobClub.NAME: Nob Club
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b{0} Attacks, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to a random enemy.

${ModID}:GremlinStaff.NAME: Gremlin Staff
${ModID}:GremlinStaff.FLAVOR: Your hand tingles when you hold it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your #b3rd turn, gain #b{0} #yVigor.

${ModID}:WarHorn.NAME: War Horn
${ModID}:WarHorn.FLAVOR: When you blow on this horn, you feel like you could take on anything.

${ModID}:Lockpicks.NAME: Lock Picks
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b{0} #yGold upon entering a rest site.

${ModID}:Bowtie.NAME: Bow Tie
${ModID}:Bowtie.FLAVOR: It makes you look twice as professional.

${ModID}:LousePlushie.NAME: Louse Plushie
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you take unblocked Attack damage each combat, gain #b{0} #yBlock next turn.
